programme.title: New Scandinavian Cooking

programme.title: P. Allen Smith's Garden Home
programme.desc: Learn how to incorporate the use of natural ingredients into your gardening.

programme.title: Garden Smart
programme.desc: Horticultural experts from across the U.S. share their knowledge and gardening experience.

programme.title: New Scandinavian Cooking
programme.desc: Danish chef Claus Meyer joins Andreas in Ribe, the oldest town in Scandinavia, where they prepare oysters with herbs, an herbal yogurt smoothie, a cornporridge dessert with fresh berries, and a beef sirloin served with beans, nuts, and thyme.

programme.title: New Scandinavian Cooking
programme.desc: Andreas visits hot spots around Iceland, even trying his hand at grilling inside volcano. In addition to a lamb dish, he cooks salmon and vegetables in a secluded geyser. He learns to makes artisanal salt, and later uses it in a salt-baked trout dish.

programme.title: New Scandinavian Cooking
programme.desc: The host travels through Scandinavian countries to share regional cooking tips and recipes.

programme.title: New Scandinavian Cooking
programme.desc: Andrea visits southern Finland that locals refer to as the 'rye belt' and greets chef Sara La Fountain. Both chefs create their favourite sandwiches, made with the best rye bread and then a look at a traditional Finnish desert made with rye bread.

programme.title: New Scandinavian Cooking
programme.desc: The host travels through Scandinavian countries to share regional cooking tips and recipes.

programme.title: New Scandinavian Cooking
programme.desc: Codfish ranks among Norway's most important exports. Host Andreas Viestad follows the codfish from its origin near the Lofoten Islands in Northern Norway to the table in Italy.

programme.title: New Scandinavian Cooking
programme.desc: Andreas visits Geitmyra Farm in the middle of Oslo, Norway, the site of his new food culture center for kids. There he and the kids make cereal, chicken soup, lamb stew and a sweet dessert.

programme.title: New Scandinavian Cooking
programme.desc: Niklas investigates the most popular drink in Scandinavia, namely coffee, and travels to Brazil.

programme.title: New Scandinavian Cooking
programme.desc: Andreas makes a lightly cured cod with beetroot and anise and cooks freshly caught cod.

programme.title: New Scandinavian Cooking
programme.desc: Andreas goes on a polar expedition, visits the mountains of northern Norway and cooks king crab.

programme.title: Nick Stellino: Storyteller in the Kitchen
programme.desc: While pondering life as a vegetarian, Nick discovers some fabulous new dishes loaded with spectacular flavors. Dishes include: chilled cantaloupe soup, salmon with spinach and pancetta cream sauce and Biancomangiare (Sicilian almond pudding).

programme.title: Simply Ming
programme.desc: Dishes include fried fish Southern style with black-eyed pea salad and Thai bird Chile tempura fish.

programme.title: tasteMAKERS
programme.desc: Yoshihiro Sako makes Sake with rice grown on Rue and Forsman ranch in Sacramento Valley.

programme.title: Lidia's Kitchen
programme.desc: Lidia creates a medley of vegetables, salami, cheese and hard boiled eggs for her chopped salad with Frisee and Fennel. She also prepares a Chicken Cacciatore as well as a Potato and Egg Frico.

programme.desc: Rochelle takes it upon herself to tutor Chris. His class is counting on him to master algebra in time for a math competition. Rochelle's teaching tactics are not working for Chris, so he secretly meets with Rochelle's mother, a former algebra teacher.

programme.title: The Bernie Mac Show

programme.title: The Bernie Mac Show

programme.title: The Bernie Mac Show
programme.desc: When Wanda leaves on a business trip, Bryan moves in temporarily to help out around the house. At first, Bernie doubts Bryan's ability to manage household chores, but when Bryan goes above and beyond to be the perfect 'housewife,' everyone is impressed.

programme.title: The Bernie Mac Show
programme.desc: Wanda's sister, Valerie, comes into town for Wanda's birthday and is intent on throwing her a roller disco party. But when the group arrives at the roller rink and finds it closed, Bryan saves the day and brings the party to the parking lot.

programme.title: The Bernie Mac Show
programme.desc: Jordan is smitten with his new girlfriend, Erica, and everyone is surprised that he is dating a good-looking cheerleader. But when he's abruptly dumped for another guy, Jordan is devastated until a talk with Bernie and a new girl mend his broken heart.

programme.desc: When a supermodel is found dead in a giant martini glass on a Times Square billboard, the team follows the evidence in search of a party crasher.
